messages.subject: the FIRST MESSAGE - Welcome
messages.msgSnippet: This is the first post in what i hope will be a successful exchange of Japanese history via email.  This List Serve will focus on the Samurai of Japanese
messages.messageBody:
This is the first post in what i hope will be a successful exchange
of Japanese history via email. This List Serve will focus on the
Samurai of Japanese history - feel free to post any questions or
comments on the subject of Japanese Samurai history. Any other
questions falling outside the range of Samurai history in particular
are welcome at the 'Samurai History' Forum, at
www.delphi.com/samuraihistory/

Apparently Japanese fonts are also useable on this listserve, so feel
free to post in Japanese as well if necesary.

Thanks,

Moderator
CEWest
